duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and changes of broadband service, while adhering to safety standards and company procedures.
Update customer account to ensure accurate record of products and services.
Troubleshoot and problem solve customer inquiries and concerns.
Communicate, engage, and educate customers on products and services.
Persist and finish projects despite obstacles, and take extra steps to prevent mistakes.
Use installation tools, hand tools, and perform jobs from high places.
Lift and carry loads of 70 lbs. or more, work in confined spaces, and work while standing for extended periods.
Maintain proper equipment in the company vehicle and drive in a safe and responsible manner.
Work a variable schedule, including nights, weekends, and overtime when necessary.
Complete required safety training and certifications.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
